bibdata.title: IEEE/CSA Standard for Impedance Heating of Pipelines and Equipment
Application Guide for Design, Installation, Testing, Commissioning, and Maintenance
IEEE/CSA Standard for Impedance Heating of Pipelines and Equipment - Application Guide for Design, Installation, Testing, Commissioning, and Maintenance

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: An application guide for the design, installation, testing, commissioning, and maintenance of impedance heating systems for pipelines and equipment intended for use in general industrial applications is provided in this standard. This standard provides requirements when utilizing impedance heating systems in ordinary as well as hazardous areas having explosive atmospheres.

An application guide for the design, installation, testing, commissioning, and maintenance of impedance heating systems for pipelines and equipment intended for use in general industrial applications is provided in this standard. This standard provides requirements when utilizing impedance heating systems in ordinary as well as hazardous areas having explosive atmospheres.
